name: Miku's Adventures in Time
description:
~Narrative~

 Hatsune Miku and her vocaloid friends live each day in happiness and joy but little did they know about the shadow that was growing inside one of their close friends. Miku and her friends get pulled back in time and into the real world. Miku now has to explore the real world searching for her lost friends and to find the truth as to why they all got separated in the first place. Luckily for Miku her friends are rather resourceful so they can fit in anywhere but that doesn't stop every monster in the world wanting a piece of you.

Join Hatsune Miku in this 2.5D casual RPG adventure where you can explore a lovely world with some rather enjoyable company.

Will you help her to find her friends and find out the real reason behind their time slip?

~Controls~

Explore the game by using the Directional buttons displayed on screen.

Talk to Yu the giant NPC by getting close and pressing the confirm button, you will then need to keep pressing this button to talk to him

Walk into enemies to battle them or try to predict their paths and dodge them, be warned some NPCs and dialogue cannot be avoided as it is required to show the narrative.

~System Specs~

Android version 4.0 or newer

at least 108MB space available
